snippet.title: Slime 64: Slimes of the World (Release Trailer)
snippet.description:
Play & Wishlist FOR FREE: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1562410/Slime_64/

Slime 64 is a 3D collectathon platformer inspired by retro classics! Play as water, earth, fire, and air slimes, in any order you'd like, while collecting various Bells & Whistles (and Golden Keys) to continue each slime's journey. Help them meet up, combine their powers, and save the world! 

Follow us on Twitter: https://twitter.com/Slime_64
Join our Discord: https://waveparadigm.com/slime64-discord
